name: ZeUSD
description: Zoth is building a first of its kind Re-Staking layer for the RWAFi ecosystem, blending the scalability of TradFi with the innovation of DeFi. At its core is ZeUSD, is an RWAFi CDP stable token, uniquely designed with omnichain collateralization capabilities, enabling access to best yields in DeFi. With ZeUSD users not only get access to high quality cross chain yield products of their choice, but also now realize unified liquidity and DeFi composability.
